title: Wasabi Covert Copy strengthens cloud storage security
description: Wasabi has expanded its cyber resilient cloud storage capabilities with Covert Copy, a patent pending, ransomware-resistant storage solution that allows users to create a locked, hidden copy of storage buckets to ensure critical data remains untouchable, even…
